00040 #ifndef _particleeffect_h
00041 #define _particleeffect_h
00042 
00043 #include "attachable.h"
00044 #include "crossplatformexport.h"
00045 #include "datatypes.h"
00046 
00047 namespace Ogre
00048 {
00049     class ParticleSystem;
00050     class SceneNode;
00051 }
00052 
00053 namespace phys
00054 {
00055     class SceneManager;
00056     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057     /// @class ParticleEffect
00058     /// @headerfile particleeffect.h
00059     /// @brief This class is responsible for creating visual particle effects, such as rain, smoke, sparks, and explosions.
00060     /// @details Particle effects are loaded from particle scripts which are contained in particle files(*.particle). @n
00061     /// Note: If attaching a particle effect to a node, all transform information(position and orientation) becomes relative
00062     /// to the nodes transform.
00063     ///////////////////////////////////////
00064     class PHYS_LIB ParticleEffect : public Attachable
00065     {
00066         protected:
00067             friend class Node;
00068             /// @brief Pointer to the ogre ParticleSystem from which this class gets it's functionality.
00069             Ogre::ParticleSystem* OgreParticle;
00070             /// @brief Pointer to the ogre Scenenode to which this object is attached.
00071             Ogre::SceneNode* OgreNode;
00072             /// @brief Pointer to the manager that created this class.
00073             SceneManager* Manager;
00074         public:
00075             /// @brief Standard initialization constructor.
00076             /// @param Name The name of this particle effect.
00077             /// @param Template Name of the particle script to be used in creating this particle effect.
00078             /// @param manager Pointer to the manager that this particle effect is to be used in.
00079             ParticleEffect(const String& Name, const String& Template, SceneManager* manager);
00080             /// @brief Internal constructor.
00081             /// @details This constructor should not be called on manually.
00082             /// @param System Pointer to the Ogre ParticleSystem this class is based on.
00083             /// @param manager Pointer to the manager that this particle effect is to be used in.
00084             ParticleEffect(Ogre::ParticleSystem* System, SceneManager* manager);
00085             /// @brief Class destructor.
00086             ~ParticleEffect();
00087             /// @brief Gets the name of this particle effect.
00088             /// @return Returns a string containing the name given to this particle effect.
00089             ConstString& GetName();
00090             /// @brief Enables the particle effect, allowing it to render.
00091             void EnableParticleEffect();
00092             /// @brief Disables the particle effect, preventing it from rendering.
00093             void DisableParticleEffect();
00094     };
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif
